file.name: service-api-v2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Transaction Integration API
  version: 2.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/integration-api/v1
    description: The server
tags:
  - name: TransactionIntegration
paths:
  /service-api/v2/transactions:
    post:
      tags:
        - TransactionIntegration
      summary: Pulls transactions for the Arrangement and either date range of number of billing cycles.
      description: Pulls transactions.
      operationId: pullTransactions
      requestBody:
        description: Push Ingestion Request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PullIngestionRequest'

      responses:
        "200":
          description: Transactions sucessfully returned.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PullTransactionsResponse'

        "400":
          description: BadRequest
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequest'
        "500":
          description: InternalServerError
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerError'

components:
  schemas:
    BadRequest:
      required:
        - message
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

    PullIngestionRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        arrangementId:
          type: string
        externalArrangementId:
          type: string
        dateRangeStart:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        dateRangeEnd:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        billingCycles:
          type: integer
        additions:
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string

    PullTransactionsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        transactions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '../../../target/yaml/transaction-manager/transaction-manager-service-api-v2.7.0.yaml#/components/schemas/TransactionsPostRequestBody'

    InternalServerError:
      required:
        - message
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "PullTransactionsResponse": parse schema: property "transactions": parse schema: parse schema: at 1:652: external "../../../target/yaml/transaction-manager/transaction-manager-service-api-v2.7.0.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
